short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Worldwide travel destination backgrounds to your new Chrome tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visit some of the world's most popular destinations right from your Chrome new tab. You can go on autopilot or choose from specific countries and regions like Australia, France, Denmark, Africa, Hawaii and numerous other top travel spots in the world. 

This extension includes a search feature as part of the new tab experience. The search bar is powered by Yahoo!

By clicking on the "Add to Chrome" button, I accept and agree to installing the ‘Travel Backgrounds’ Chrome extension and setting new tab search to that provided by the service, accept to the other changes made by the service, and to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

New, gorgeous photo backgrounds are added regularly.

Privacy: https://travel-backgrounds.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of use: https://travel-backgrounds.com/terms-of-use/

Contact us:   https://travel-backgrounds.com/contact-2/

Uninstall info: https://travel-backgrounds.com/uninstall/

Requested Permissions: 
Storage
This is used to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.
